entry.title: Yoga Prop Basics Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Unclassified
Price: 210.00

The Yoga Prop Basics Bundle - Plum contains all the professional-grade props you’ll need for any style of yoga: a bolster, two yoga blocks, a yoga strap, and an eye pillow. Each accessory helps you modify or deepen your practice, whether you’re a student or teacher, at home or in the studio.

Rectangular Bolster
Our Rectangular Bolster promotes gentle chest opening, makes a great back bending prop, and provides a moderate lift for forward bends and legs up the wall.

Cork Yoga Block
Our Natural Cork Yoga Block can aid you in supporting ease or depths in any type of yoga. made from sustainably harvested cork that provides comfort, stability, and support.

Note: 2 blocks are included in this bundle.

8' Organic Cotton Loop Strap
Our 8' Organic Cotton Loop Strap was designed with a fixed loop on one end for easy and quick use during your yoga practice. Deepen your stretches, gain easier access into binds, and extend your reach with this multi-posture tool.

Linen Eye Pillow with Lavender
Our Linen Eye Pillow is a beautiful and natural eye pillow option. Linen is highly durable, hypoallergenic, and breathable fabric. The wheatberry-filled Linen Eye Pillow creates a subtle pressure on the eyes when placed on the face during restorative yoga, before bed, after screen time, or while travelling. Use at room temperature or heat up in the microwave for an added warm touch and invigoration of the lavender aroma.


FEATURES

  • Rectangular Bolster - Dense, quality, handmade interior batting for longevity, easy carry handle
  • Cork Yoga Block (x2) - Weighted for stability with rounded ergonomic corners
  • 8' Organic Cotton Loop Strap - Organic soft cotton, fixed loop end
  • Linen Eye Pillow - Calming lavender scent. Heatable for the ultimate relaxation (remove linen cover while heating)


SPECS

  • Rectangular Bolster - 5" x 10" x 24" (13 cm x 25 cm x 61 cm) / 5 lbs (2.3 kg) / 100% Linen Casing
  • Cork Yoga Block - 3.5” × 5.5” × 9” (9 cm × 14 cm × 23cm) / 2.1 lbs (0.95 kg) / Natural Cork
  • 8’ Organic Cotton Loop Strap - 1.5" x 8’’ (3.8 cm x 183 cm) / 100% organic cotton and webbing with brushed nickel slide buckle
  • Linen Eye Pillow - 8" x 4.5" (20.3 cm x 11.5 cm) / Cover: 55% linen 45% cotton / 99% wheatberry 1% lavender filling


PRODUCT CARE

  • Rectangular Bolster - Remove cover from the bolster. Machine wash cover in cool water on the delicate cycle. Hang to dry. Do not bleach
  • Cork Yoga Block - Natural/non-aggressive spray (like our Mat Cleanser) and wipe to dry.
  • 8’ Organic Cotton Loop Strap - Hand wash in cold water, hang to dry
  • Linen Eye Pillow - Remove cover, machine wash cold and hang to dry

entry.title: Yoga Prop Basics Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Unclassified
Price: 191.00

The Yoga Prop Basics Bundle - Charcoal contains all the professional-grade props you’ll need for any style of yoga: a bolster, two yoga blocks, a yoga strap, and an eye pillow. Each accessory helps you modify or deepen your practice, whether you’re a student or teacher, at home or in the studio.

Rectangular Bolster
Our Rectangular Bolster promotes gentle chest opening, makes a great back bending prop, and provides a moderate lift for forward bends and legs up the wall.

Cork Yoga Block
Our Natural Cork Yoga Block can aid you in supporting ease or depths in any type of yoga. made from sustainably harvested cork that provides comfort, stability, and support.

Note: 2 blocks are included in this bundle.

8' Organic Cotton Loop Strap
Our 8' Organic Cotton Loop Strap was designed with a fixed loop on one end for easy and quick use during your yoga practice. Deepen your stretches, gain easier access into binds, and extend your reach with this multi-posture tool.

Silk Eye Pillow with Lavender
Our Silk Eye Pillow was designed to calm, relax and destress. The luxuriously soft silk cover and weighted wheatberry fill relaxes the face and facial muscles by applying a gentle and soft pressure to the eyes.


FEATURES

  • Rectangular Bolster - Dense, quality, handmade interior batting for longevity, easy carry handle
  • Cork Yoga Block (x2) - Weighted for stability with rounded ergonomic corners
  • 8' Organic Cotton Loop Strap - Organic soft cotton, fixed loop end
  • Silk Eye Pillow - Calming lavender scent. Heatable for the ultimate relaxation (remove silk cover while heating)


SPECS

  • Rectangular Bolster - 5" x 10" x 24" (13 cm x 25 cm x 61 cm) / 5 lbs (2.3 kg) / 100% Cotton Casing
  • Cork Yoga Block - 3.5” × 5.5” × 9” (9 cm × 14 cm × 23cm) / 2.1 lbs (0.95 kg) / Natural Cork
  • 8’ Organic Cotton Loop Strap - 1.5" x 8’’ (3.8 cm x 183 cm) / 100% organic cotton and webbing with brushed nickel slide buckle
  • Silk Eye Pillow - 8" x 5" (20.3 cm x 12.7 cm) / 100% Pure Silk Cover / Lavender filling


PRODUCT CARE

  • Rectangular Bolster - Remove cover from the bolster. Machine wash cover in cool water on the delicate cycle. Hang to dry. Do not bleach
  • Cork Yoga Block - Natural/non-aggressive spray (like our Mat Cleanser) and wipe to dry.
  • 8’ Organic Cotton Loop Strap - Hand wash in cold water, hang to dry
  • Silk Eye Pillow - Remove cover, wash in cold water and hang to dry.
